description:
Send SMS with the smsflatrate webOS application. All you need is a free account on smsflatrate.net.

There you can recharge your balance, send SMS directly from the Website and use many other free apps (browser addon, desktop software) in addition to this app. All with just one account.

And this are the functions:
- Send SMS with or without name
- Worldwide messaging
- Up to 1000 characters per message
- Display current balance
- Display SMS price of selected SMS-Gateway
- English, German

You can send SMS for already under 2 eurocent. Our current prices can be found on our website smsflatrate.net.

Sign Up:
You need an account on smsflatrate.net, please register. Go to the user login on the menu item "Appkey” an use the following license number: 104979553 to generate your own Appkey. Set this Appkey in your app in the menue "Settings"- done!

Now test smsflatrate.net with the free starting balance immediately.
